name: Just Another Day (Dungeon And Rockets)
description:
Just Another Day is a game about a guy and his day to day life while on quarantine.

All the player have to do is comply with the character's seemly tedious daily routine. However, sometimes life gets monotonous and repetitive, and feels like we are stuck on a loop... unless...

Can you break this cycle?

A game made by Alexander "Alek" Martins, Gabriel "Red Yoshi" Kiesshau, Guilherme "Chaoseiro" Maia, Lucas "Ike" Emmanuel, Tiago "Bontah" Carneiro and Vinicius "Bottini" Nipote.

PS: You Can Pet The Dog.


We had a game breaking bug that needed to be solved. Now everything's running smoothly enough.

Known bugs and problems:
• You can only exit the game by using Alt+F4. Sorry, we're working on it!

• Sometimes the taskboard's checkmarks can bug out and mark tasks as completed even when the player hasn't completed them on the day;

• No visual feedback on the kitchen sink after finishing the basic task;

•No visual feedback on the laptop after finishing the basic task;

• No visual feedback showing the pantry's garbage;

• Speaking of the pantry, some of you may get stuck outside the game world when atempting to do a specific interaction. It isn't intended, and if it happens the only solution is to restart the game. Sorry! We're looking forward to patch this too.

• In rare occurrences, the game can get stuck and tasks doesn't count as completed. It seems to happen when the player manages to do the same task twice on the same day, but it isn't confirmed yet. We're looking forward to fix that as soon as we confirm what is the issue causing this, sorry!
